abstract: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China agreed to pay the South African lender Standard Bank $600 million for control of three financial units in Argentina.
snippet: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China agreed to pay the South African lender Standard Bank $600 million for control of three financial units in Argentina.
lead_paragraph: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China said Friday that it had agreed to pay the South African lender Standard Bank $600 million for control of three financial units in Argentina.

headline.main: I.C.B.C. to Buy Controlling Stake in Argentine Bank

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China
